committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to authorize the conveyance of 470 acres in Nevada to the University of Nevada for use as a research and development center.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Directs the Secretary of the Interior to permit the University of Nevada to use (either directly or by lease) specified lands in Mount Diablo Meridian, Nevada, as a research and development center.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the conveyance of 470 acres in Nevada to the University of Nevada for use as a research and development center.
